name: Keen Strider
description: Keen Strider is a long range DPS/support class equiped with a Bow. This class is agile and deals increased damage on enemy weakspots.The class has several attack, buff / debuff and support abilities. They can also use ground element skills to apply more effects to enemies.
quote: A technical class that specializes in party battles and excels at mid and long-range attacks and support.

basicSkills.name: Arrow Rush
basicSkills.description: Chain attack, which can be casted while moving. The last attack shoots multiple arrows.

basicSkills.name: Slalom Shot
basicSkills.description: Shoots a powerful arrow. If you press any direction key during the last attack, you will dodge towards the input direction.

tacticalSkills.name: Charge Arrow
tacticalSkills.description: Shoots a chargeable arrow, which deals damage according to the charged amount. This skill will deal increased damage, if you hit a weak spot. Knockback effect if you charge the arrow.

tacticalSkills.name: Hypnoblast Shoots
tacticalSkills.description: Throws an arrow on the enemies and puts them to sleep.

tacticalSkills.name: Negative Resonance
tacticalSkills.description: Releases arrows going straight and spread on hit ailment applied on enemies.

tacticalSkills.name: Stampede Arrow
tacticalSkills.description: Shoot multiple homing arrows at the enemy.

tacticalSkills.name: Lethal Shower
tacticalSkills.description: Shoot arrows upwards which has the effect of creating an area on the ground attacking all the enemies inside. The more the skill is loaded, the larger the area.

tacticalSkills.name: Dust Force
tacticalSkills.description: Throws an arrow to activate a ground AOE slowing enemies and inflicting damage over time.

tacticalSkills.name: Healing Arrow
tacticalSkills.description: An AOE heal arrow, that can heal the team and yourself.

tacticalSkills.name: Hunter Spirit
tacticalSkills.description: Launch a Cooldown reduction buff on yourself and your group.

ultimateSkill.name: Mortal Gravity
ultimateSkill.description: Fire a gravitational arrow which creates an area attracting enemies to its middle.
